member.name: M:MeshByFaceNodes.MeshByFacePipeline.CreateOBJFile(System.String)
member.summary: This node takes the output of the MeshByFace.WebcamSelfie node (a filepath to a .jpg image as a string) and uses the EOS ML framework to derive a Mesh stored in the .obj format.
member.param: String: the fully-qualified filepath to the .jpeg created by the MeshByFace.WebcamSelfie node.
member.returns: String: the fully-qualified filepath of the generated .obj file.

member.name: M:MeshByFaceNodes.TwitterConnection.TweetSelfie(System.String)
member.summary: This node takes the output of the MeshByFace.WebcamSelfie node (a filepath to a .jpg image as a string) and uses the EOS ML framework to derive a Mesh stored in the .obj format.
member.param: String: the fully-qualified filepath to the .jpeg created by the MeshByFace.WebcamSelfie node.
member.returns: String: the fully-qualified filepath of the generated .obj file.
